agent.display_value: Microsoft Teams notification management AI agent

sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.description: This tool enables posting replies to specific messages in Microsoft Teams channels, requiring Team, Channel, and Message IDs. It supports inline image attachments. It doesn't support mentions using the `@` tag and SharePoint attachments. Outputs include the posted message ID and action status. Errors like 'Unauthorized' or 'Invalid IDs' may occur. A Microsoft Teams Graph connection and subscription are required for use.

sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.name: Post Reply to Message
